name: Abby's Song
description:
A father, a friend, a demon.

Dr. Daniels must escape his own personal Hell created by Layne, the boy who murdered him. But a vicious demon named Andras will not allow him to escape so easily...

How far would you go to heal someone you love?
Enter the personal Hell of Dr. Clement Daniels, a man who did everything in his power to save his wife and paid the ultimate price for it. Now he must follow Layne's advice if he has any chance of escaping his endless torment. The demon Andras and his wolf are all that stand in the way of forgiveness and, hopefully, peace at last.

You'll need a keen eye and a quick mind if there's any hope of redemption. Keep going, and don't mind Andras. It's not like you can die twice… Do it again.
